text: Kambiz is a Persian male given name meaning 'prosperous, fortunate'. The name is commonly used in Iran, Pakistan and Turkey. Variants include Kami. This is a unique name (not in the top 1000 newborn names in the US in 2021). == Notable people == * Kambiz Qajar, Iranian Lawyer a cousin of Mohsen Movaghar * Kambiz Razaghi, General officer of USA Army, he served United States under Iraq War and Afghanistan war. * Kambiz Hosseini, TV and radio host * Kambuzia Partovi, Iranian film director and screenwriter == Related pages == * Kami Name ==References==
title: Kambiz
